comment.author: 92943860@N00
comment._content:
This is taken in Nairobi outside the Khoja Mosque in what was then Government Road and is now Moi Avenue. Here is what the view looks like from the other end of Government Road in 1945 (Khoja Mosque is the building with the dome in the distance):

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/92943860@N00/244420827/]
